basic.floral_language:
Strelitzia reginae 
Floriography: happy, free, blessed
Strelitzia reginae has a handsome looking evergreen plant with large and dark leaves, oblong shape, bright and colorful inflorescence, usually has blue-violet petals, its flower resembles a bird flying, also known as "Bird of Paradise". Used for garden landscaping. Flower beds or indoor decoration.
Strelitzia reginae likes sunshine, shade properly in summer to avoid strong sunlight, in winter can be placed under sunlight. Flowers in winter up to one month.
basic.blooming: Flowering period winter, viewing period 3-4 weeks
basic.color: Flower color white, purple, light blue, orange

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, shade properly under summer strong light, in winter full sun
maintenance.watering: Not resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 10-15 days in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased, dead leaves and withered flowers timely
